sqlQuery.name: CompoundAlias
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, source_id as old_source_id FROM ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, compound_name, definition, secondary_ids, other_names, CASE WHEN source_id IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE '' || source_id || '' END AS compound_link, formula FROM ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Synonyms
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ca.source_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(n.name) AS apidb.varchartab)),', ') as synonyms FROM ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes ca, chebi.names n WHERE ca.ID = n.compound_id(+) GROUP BY ca.source_id

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count (DISTINCT pc.pathway_id) AS pathway_count, pc.chebi_accession AS source_id FROM ApiDBTuning.PathwayCompounds pc GROUP BY chebi_accession

sqlQuery.name: DefaultStructure
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, CASE WHEN default_structure is NULL THEN to_clob(0) ELSE default_structure END as default_structure FROM ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes c, (WITH nodes AS ( SELECT id, compound FROM apidbtuning.compoundId WHERE type IN ('same ID', 'child ID') ) SELECT ca.source_id , s.STRUCTURE AS default_structure FROM apidbtuning.compoundattributes ca, chebi.structures s, chebi.default_structures ds, nodes n WHERE ca.source_id = n.compound AND n.id = 'CHEBI:'|| s.compound_id AND s.id = ds.structure_id AND s.type='mol' and s.dimension='2D') s WHERE c.source_id = s.source_id(+)
